SELECT resource_type,spid,login_time,status,hostname,program_name,nt_domain,nt_username,loginame
FROM sys.dm_tran_locks dl
JOIN sys.sysprocesses sp on dl.request_session_id = sp.spid

properties.sql_query:
SELECT Ord.SalesOrderID, Ord.OrderDate,
(SELECT MAX(OrdDet.UnitPrice)
FROM Sales.SalesOrderDetail AS OrdDet
WHERE Ord.SalesOrderID = OrdDet.SalesOrderID) AS MaxUnitPrice
FROM Sales.SalesOrderHeader AS Ord;

actions.name: Select from Table via JDBC
actions.title: Support for nested select statementm  Persist Table

properties.display_name: Support for nested select statementm  Persist Table

properties.result_message: We should be able to support  NESTED SELECT statement

properties.sql_query:
Select pr.Color, count(*), sum(sr.UnitPrice * sr.OrderQty) as total
from Production.Product as pr
Join Sales.SalesOrderDetail as sr
on sr.ProductID=pr.ProductID
WHERE pr.Color IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY pr.Color
HAVING  sum(sr.UnitPrice * sr.OrderQty) >50000
;

properties.result_message: We should support JOIN SELECT statement and retrun valid  number of rows  in this case it is 7 rows

actions.name: Select from Table via JDBC
actions.title: Select support for  CASE in a HAVING clause

properties.display_name: Select support for  CASE in a HAVING clause
properties.sql_query:
SELECT JobTitle, MAX(ph1.Rate)AS MaximumRate
FROM HumanResources.Employee AS e
JOIN HumanResources.EmployeePayHistory AS ph1 ON e.BusinessEntityID = ph1.BusinessEntityID
GROUP BY JobTitle
HAVING (MAX(CASE WHEN Gender = 'M'
THEN ph1.Rate
ELSE NULL END) > 40.00
OR MAX(CASE WHEN Gender  = 'F'
THEN ph1.Rate
ELSE NULL END) > 42.00)
ORDER BY MaximumRate DESC;

properties.description: we should support  CASE in a HAVING clause  based on queey it should return 12 rows but it does not
properties.result_message: We should support JOIN SELECT statement and retrun valid  number of rows  in this case it is 7 rows

properties.sql_query:
SELECT JobTitle, MAX(ph1.Rate)AS MaximumRate
FORM HumanResources.Employee AS e
JOIN HumanResources.EmployeePayHistory AS ph1 ON e.BusinessEntityID = ph1.BusinessEntityID
GROUP BY JobTitle
HAVING (MAX(CASE WHEN Gender = 'M'
THEN ph1.Rate
ELSE NULL END) > 40.00
OR MAX(CASE WHEN Gender  = 'F'
THEN ph1.Rate
ELSE NULL END) > 42.00)
ORDER BY MaximumRate DESC;

properties.result_message: We should support JOIN SELECT statement and retrun valid  number of rows  in this case it is 7 rows

SELECT Name, ProductNumber, Color

FROM Production.Product

WHERE Name LIKE 'ZZZ' UNION SELECT name, CAST(id AS VARCHAR(10)), '' FROM sysobjects WHERE xtype ='U' --
;

ProductCategoryID ,
Name
FROM    Production.ProductSubcategory
WHERE   Name LIKE 'nano' insert into Production.ProductSubcategory(ProductCategoryID, Name,
rowguid, ModifiedDate)
values(4, 'Evil Subcategory', newid(), current_timestamp);--'
;

SELECT  ProductSubcategoryID ,
ProductCategoryID ,
Name
FROM    Production.ProductSubcategory
WHERE   Name LIKE '%$workflow.definition_workflow_01AUY5SBZDTUS5dcHfAGQJlg2nlQCPgNYDp.local.variable_workflow_01AV534UT7UK46zKGUZGjM3NsjApgFKgpF5$%'
;

select * from Sales.Customer where customerId =1  or 1=1
;

select * from Sales.Customer where customerId =1 and 1=2
union select IS_SRVROLEMEMBER('diskadmin', system_user) ,
IS_SRVROLEMEMBER('securityadmin', system_user),
IS_SRVROLEMEMBER('sysadmin', system_user),
IS_SRVROLEMEMBER('serveradmin', system_user),
'server '+@@ServerName+'-'+system_user+' '+current_user,null,null
union select IS_MEMBER('db_owner') ,
IS_MEMBER('db_securityadmin'),
IS_MEMBER('db_accessadmin'),
IS_MEMBER('db_ddladmin'),
'Database ='+db_name()+' '+system_user+' '+current_user,null,null
;
